author: Michelle Price
comment: This really helps me stay on schedule to ensure my daily water intake.

author: Md Mustafa Uddin Khan
comment: Awesome App!

author: SHAKOOR AFRIDI
comment: loved

It's just ok! I mean , the fact that it's supposed to give reminders after every hour is fine! But the truth is that THIS APP DOESN'T GIVE ANY REMINDERS AT ALL!!! the only good thing in this app is that you can keep track of how much water you drank... But manually though!!! I would appreciate it  a lot if this app would fulfill it's actual purpose!!! 😕😕😣😣😣😤😤😤😧😧😖😔😫😫

author: Neuni Farhad
comment: Does what I wanted it to. It's meant to remind you to drink and keep track of your water intake and that's what it does! Simple but extremely useful I don't think it needs much else, wish there wasn't so many pop ups but other than that it's all good!

Incessant pop up ads. Every time the app updates itself ads keep popping up on the lock screen and upon charging. Other than that, I do like how it tracks both water intake and weight. Can't find another app like it

reply.author: Leap Fitness Group
reply.content:
27/5000
Our app definitely will not pop up charging screen, may be caused by other apps (or other water reminder app), please double check.

author: Audrey Mabugay
comment: I like this. But it will be better if you add water intakes depending on what liquid you drink. I am looking for a hot choco drink icon there is none. Then realized all the icon for water no matter what the icon is (like coffee icon) is not actually means you drink coffee but just an indication of amount of water drunk. Wish you could use the icon as what it is

author: Helena
comment: This is a really great app, I've been using it for close to a year now. It's accurate, it's simply designed and there are no distractions. There are adds, but they're not annoying or feel like they're in the way. And it takes little memory. I highly recommend this app. :)

author: Holly Ekstrom
comment: I really love this app! It lets me keep track of how much water I've had and how much I still have to go. It tells me how much water I should be consuming given my weight.

author: Yash Vijayvargiya
comment: It is a basic reminder app. Didn't keep track of how much water you have had, it'll just remind you every hour to drink water so even if you had a gallon of water an hour ago, it'll still remind you to take water. Req you to make it more smart by introducing body water level feature where it can track the hydration level of the body and remind accordingly.

author: Varun Kapur
comment: It's good as in it will remind you to replenish you fluid levels throught the day. It's good for gym nuts who need to up their water intake. Some trivia on the benefits of water would be good too and should be added to make the app sticky amongst its users.

author: Joseph Radway
comment: I'm horrible at drinking enough water on a daily basis.  This app helps keep me accountable in meeting my daily water goal.
One of the best app. But you should count how much total water i'll drink whole month or year & which day i consumed  highest plenty of water through out now date👍😁

author: MaRei Curei
comment: It's a great help. I've realised I wasnt drinking much until I downloaded this app.  EDIT: To everyone saying about ads AND it doesn't remind you, well check your phones, ads didn't ever bugged me or my phone, and it definitely alarms or reminds me whenever it's time to drink. Either your phone sucks or you just don't know what you're doing with it. 😂😂😂

author: siva balan
comment: Good UI and features, first installed and more than enough for me no other apps tried... Cost to remove ads is high. If it is 50Rs I purchase for sure.. 130 in Indian Rupees is too high.. Will give 5 Star if price is less than 50.

author: Nicole Maisonet-West
comment: Helps keep me on track hourly. Making sure I drink enough daily has been helping with my weight loss. Great app!

author: S Navarathan
comment: Yeahhh i loved this app I don't know about others but it is really helpful to me actually I don't likes to drink water even fr a whole day but now its reminding me for every half an hour nd I'm fallowing the reminders

author: Patricia Jones
comment: Based on my weight, not a random number of ounces. Gives reminders based on my choices. No intrusive ads, one or two a day when I have the app open. Easy to use, and easy connection to major health tracking apps.

author: Brittani Bolton
comment: This app has been so easy to use. I've been able to further adjust it since I'm nursing. It is as simple as hitting a button. Love that it has the reminders on during times you're usually awake. Perfect for my lifestyle.

author: Emmaly Choice
comment: Best water app I've found! Does the job of reminding me to drink and doesn't run my battery down! Also syncs to my watch! Score!!

author: Nasreen Irfan Rangoonwala
comment: One of the most important things in our life and we ignore it!! Your Reminder for a glass of water is ideal and the sound of the flowing water makes us thirsty and compells us to stop whatever we are doing to get the much needed glass of water!! Thank you!!

author: Aarati Sakhare
comment: Drink option should be only in notification bar. But we have to open the app for every drink and choose the glass which is annoying and time consuming.

author: Val Johnson
comment: This is a GREAT app! I love how it reminds me to drink my water! I hv been dehydrated more than once, so I need these reminders.
The app is good 👌☺👍it really works becoz I'm lazy when it comes to my health. Thanks for making the app😍i just love it❤💜💕It reminds me based on my schedules

author: Guiyu Zhao
comment: Easy to use. Love that it automatically calculates the amount of daily water needed based on your weight. It also offers different choices of drinkware ie. cup/glass/bottle.

author: Marsha Sims
comment: Too complicated! Needs a freaking manual! I just want to track my water intake!

author: D Bennett
comment: I don't know what happened, but I paid for the pro a long while back.  I changed phones and now i.have the free version.  Please advise

author: Jennifer Grove
comment: Simple. To the point. Just does one thing. I want to be reminded if I'm drinking enough liquids. The end. And it does exactly that in a fully customizable way.

author: G. Guy
comment: Way too many ads. Waste too much of my time. Big time waster. But if that does not bother you, it will remind you to drink water.

author: Jon-Lee Paul Butler
comment: Drinking more water than use to, there are some days I don't complete the suggested amount, but then there are other days I complete more than need to. It's obviously good for helping to keep a focused mind on how much to consider.

author: J'kalyn Peirson
comment: It's really helpful to remind you to drink water, but it isn't too loud which is good for school environments

author: Deborah Ricehy
comment: I'm horrible about drinking enough.  This app is easy to use, gives plenty of size options and reminders. Love it

author: Douglass Kemp
comment: I thought I had a problem, but it didn't alert me because I already hit my goal for the day.

author: Emolvia Hall
comment: I'm loving this App. It's easy to use and it's perfect for helping me stay on track with reaching my daily water goal.

author: Mandy Talbott
comment: Works well. Great reminder on those days I lose track of time and drink too little!

author: Sienna Schwartz
comment: Great but the sound for the notification won't stay on the sound I select. It always reverts back to "classic".

author: drashti soni
comment: It's very helpful app. Good working. Bt if alarm should nt stopped automatically  thn it's more valuable.

author: Ayush Pandey
comment: This is really helpful and keep me hydrated in busy schedules. Thanq v much for developing such an helpfull application

author: eddie pearson
comment: Hey guys, great app! Question though, I purchased the add on to remove ads a while back. I logged in just now and it has the ads. I go to remove it and it wants to charge me again. How do I avoid this?

author: Cassandra Coxon
comment: I LOVE IT it's had me on top of my hydration and I've felt better in the last few days than I have in months!!! Thank you!!!
